name: Busy City Streets
description: A bustling area the pigeon must navigate to avoid pedestrians while flying towards Costco.

name: Costco
description: A location full of potential food sources. Here is where the pigeon spots the delectable pizza and attempts to steal a slice.

name: Costco Eating Area
description: A site of human activity where the pigeon must cunningly mimic human actions to steal a slice of pizza, dodge angry customers, and take off.
